video.title: JavaScript + HTML5 GameDev Tutorial: 8-Ball Pool Game (part 2)
video.description:
Learn to build an 8-ball pool game from scratch with HTML5 and Javascript. This is part 2 of a 3-part series.

Part 1: https://youtu.be/aXwCrtAo4Wc
Part 3: coming soon

🔗Github repo: https://github.com/henshmi/Classic-Pool-Game
🔗Game demo: https://henshmi.github.io/Classic-Pool-Game/

⭐️ Tutorial created by Chen Shmilovich.
🔗Chen's YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLUtNUb2G2XHp9Zty__D3xw
🔗Chen on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/chen-shmilovich/

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.text: I wanted to say that I loved the video and learned a lot from it. I've followed all the previous videos and learned a lot. topLevelComment.author: Kevin Zhang
topLevelComment.text: I have learned so much by following this game tutorial .... many things I learned from other video is more like theory .. this one taught me about real stuff ... I checked the github of the final resolution ... and it seems there are many more things we will learn .. adding sounds, refactoring the code .... Again, thank you very much ... though  I didn't catch the author's name. I am looking forward to part 3!!!

replies.author: freeCodeCamp.org
